attributes.action: that all map data generated by Ordenance Survey and British Geological Survey should be avaliable free
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: data generated by the Orenance survey and the British Geological Survey is created using public money and should be avaliable free to the public. With the current quality of the internet the digital data should be provided free to download for personal/educational use as our money has paid for its creation
